reuters.title: DYNASCAN <DYNA.O> COMPLETES MANAGEMENT BUYOUT
reuters.body: Dynascan Corp said it completed the sale of its industrial electronic products group and expects to recognize about a 3.0 mln dlr pretax gain on the transaction in the fourth quarter. It said the group was sold October 15 for 13.5 mln dlrs to Maxtec International Corp, a privately held company created by the company's management team. It said the purchase price was 12 mln dlrs in cash and 1.5 mln dlrs in five-year notes plus warrants to buy 7.0 pct of the stock of Maxtec. Dynascan said the group was projected to provide about 12 pct of its consolidated sales in 1987. Reuter 
